title: Bug 116786: Library include should store relative path.
OB: The library include in the report design does not store the relative path.
EB: When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path of the library include.
SR:
To reproduce:
1. Open the BIRT designer.
2. Open a report design located at $project/test.
3. Include a library from $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary.
